channel.title: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS
channel.description:
The title says it all, I'm currently working on re-opening a RSPS which will be without a doubt successful. I can afford advertising campaigns, Moparscape sponsorship, a fast and reliable dedicated server for hosting and also a good web host for our forums. If you are interested please check below if you are good at any of them listed.
[b]Are you: [/b]
Good at Graphics? -: Flash / Photoshop A good Web Designer? -: Html / Php / Css A good Server coder? -: Javascript A good securer? -: Stop glitches / Prevent DDOS attacks / Cover up exploitations in the website / system
If you are any of them above please do contact my Skype or PM me on here. If not but think you can still help the server out, aka Advertising / Financial causes, please contact me.
Skype: [b]Jackhampson[/b]
Thankyou for your time.

item.title: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

This is not allowed in this section. If you wish to hire people, post a topic at the Development Teams board following the proper format.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS

item.title: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @nikkidespard nikkidespard
item.description:
@nikkidespard wrote:

I really could not give one flying donkeys ass what you think or your opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS

item.title: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Stop glitches? A properly programmed server should have minimal amounts of glitches. Also javascript is a web development language, java is a programming language.
https://service.parachat.com/knowledgebase/79/What-are-the-differences-between-Java-and-JavaScript.html

Your knowledge of DDOS attacks is lacking

Cisco

A Cisco Guide to Defending Against Distributed Denial of Service Attacks

A Cisco Guide to Defending Against Distributed Denial of Service Attacks

And if your site is properly developed/if your using a bigger name website there should be almost no exploitations. And lastly this is the wrong section.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring all helpful users for a new RSPS
